name: Me Little Robo
description: This is Robo, a little pet robot that copied his human's mind before he died. Now, after some centuries of trying to adapt the code to run a human simulation inside it's cpu, it was able to boot and it's alive again, fighting to survive in a world where nature regain its place and humans are no longer present for a long time... the question is: Is there any way to clone a human body and restore he's friend?
